dmca.title: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT
dmca.body:
Thomson Learning
27500 Drake Road
Farmington Hills, MI 48331
Tel: 800-877-4253 Fax 248-699-8074
www.thomsonrights.com

VIA EMAIL

March 5, 2007


RE: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

Dear Mr. xxxxxxxx:

It has come to our attention that you are offering for sale unauthorized copies of material that belong to a Thomson Learning company. You recently offered this material, identified below, for sale through an auction on Half.com.

We demand that you cease and desist any and all unauthorized use of this material immediately and confirm in writing that you have done so. All of our material is copyrighted, and, except for limited copies for specified educational uses not applicable here, reuse of copyrighted material without permission is illegal.

Please provide us with written confirmation within 10 business days from the date of this letter that you have ceased making, distributing, and offering for sale, unauthorized copies of our books and that you will refrain from any future infringing use of Thomson material. We also demand that you send us any and all illegal copies of our material presently in your possession or control.

This letter does not waive Thomson Learning
